content.question: You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible. Choose ONE modern change to traditional Chinese lifestyles (the rising popularity of online dating, online ordering of takeout food, making payments by mobile phone, etc.). In your presentation, describe this change and explain its significance. Prompt 1
